name: Macroidea Web Studio
description: In 2002, Macro Idea Studio was founded in Mexico City by Katty Ibarra, since then we have helped businesses to communicate visually better with a professional image. We've been honored to work for a dozen of small and medium businesses and also big corporations like Promotur (VisitMexico.com), ING insurance, Euler Hermes, Universidad Mexicana, Kimberly-Clark, Holcim, and many more.
